sources.title: Life
sources.description: A global view of the specialized strategies and extreme behavior that living things have developed in order to survive; what Charles Darwin termed "the struggle for existence."

sources.title: After.Life (MYSTERY THRILLER with LIAM NEESON, thriller film in German, mystery films for free)

metadata.Plot: After a horrific car accident, Anna (Ricci) wakes up to find the local funeral director Eliot Deacon (Neeson) preparing her for her funeral. Confused, terrified and feeling still very much alive, Anna doesn't believe she's dead, despite the funeral director's reassurances she's merely in transition to the afterlife. Eliot convinces her he has the ability to communicate with the dead and is the only one who can help her. Trapped inside the funeral home, with nobody to turn to except Eliot, Anna's forced to accept her own death. But Anna's grief-stricken boyfriend Paul (Long) can't shake the suspicion that Eliot isn't what he appears to be.
metadata.Writer: Agnieszka Wojtowicz-Vosloo, Paul Vosloo, Jakub Korolczuk
metadata.Actors: Christina Ricci, Liam Neeson, Justin Long
